mapper.insert: insert into book_list(bookName, authorId, publicationDate, publisher, categoryCode, bookPrice, bookStock, bookDiscount, bookIntro, bookContents) values(#{bookName},#{authorId}, #{publicationDate},#{publisher},#{categoryCode},#{bookPrice},#{bookStock},#{bookDiscount},#{bookIntro},#{bookContents})
mapper.select: select * from book_category order by categoryCode
